classify a customer support ticket into one of the following categories:
<categories>
Account Management
Billing Disputes
Billing Inquiries
Claims Assistance

Coverage Explanations
General Inquiries
Policy Administration
Policy Comparisons
Quotes and Proposals

Here is the customer support ticket:    
<ticket>I just got my auto policy renewal bill and the cost seems to be more than what I usually pay. Could you explain the reason for the increase?</ticket>

Respond using this format:
<category>The category label you chose goes here</category>
<category>Billing Inquiries</category>
